Row.Text: Party for a Country of Solidarity

Our nation has acquired large tracts of ariable land that would best be used by the common man. We shall distribute these farmlands to our poorer citizens in order to expand our economy and ensure future prosperity (barring a horribly disastrous war, but not like that'll happen...) [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Solano Lopez's Paraguay. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must been in at least the Renaissance. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]300 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_GOLD] and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] on Plantations. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] on Farms. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from unoccupied citizens.

Our nation has acquired large tracts of ariable land that would best be used by the common man. We shall distribute these farmlands to our poorer citizens in order to expand our economy and ensure future prosperity (barring a horribly disastrous war, but not like that'll happen...) [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_GOLD] and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] on Plantations. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] on Farms. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from unoccupied citizens.

Our nation finds itself in a difficult time, with war ravaging the land. To gain an advantage in this fight, we'll import new weaponry, rockets, to surprise the enemy and lay waste to their cities. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Solano Lopez's Paraguay. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Gunpowder. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at war. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]650 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15 XP for Siege units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege units will pillage forts and citadels automatically when attacking enemies stationed on one.

Our nation finds itself in a difficult time, with war ravaging the land. To gain an advantage in this fight, we'll import new weaponry, rockets, to surprise the enemy and lay waste to their cities. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15 XP for Siege units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege units will pillage forts and citadels automatically when attacking enemies stationed on one.

Our people are now starting irrational conflicts, refusing to surrender, no matter the circumstances and revisioning their national history. I fear the rest of the world will succumb to the influence of your culture.
Attacking an enemy on a fort or citadel will pillage the tile.
